featured_videos.editorial_title: Largest Carnivore/Lion Diet vs Keto vs SAD on RA and IBD launching! Finally
featured_videos.commentary: Holy cow, this is huge for anyone dealing with autoimmune challenges! Mikhaila Peterson's launching a mega research project comparing carnivore, keto, and standard diets for rheumatoid arthritis and inflammatory bowel disease - and she's already crowdfunded over $164k. If you've been struggling with these conditions and want legit data on diet's impact, this study is basically your golden ticket to understanding how food might actually help heal your body.

featured_videos.editorial_title: Carnivore/Lion Diet Update: Not Carnivore Anymore?
featured_videos.commentary: Mikhaila's latest update is a game-changer for anyone struggling with autoimmune issues or diet restrictions. After years of strict carnivore, she's showing that healing isn't a fixed destination. it's a journey where your body can adapt and improve over time. Her willingness to share her personal experience of slowly reintroducing foods gives hope to folks dealing with chronic inflammation, proving that careful, personalized dietary approaches can make massive differences in quality of life.

featured_videos.editorial_title: Optimize Your Health With A Carnivore Diet #shorts #short #weightloss
featured_videos.commentary: Holy smokes, another game-changing video from Dr. Chaffee that's gonna shake up how people think about diet and healing. His no-supplement, straight-talk approach is exactly why carnivore folks are gravitating toward his content. What's killer here is how he's creating real community support through his 90-day challenge, giving people an actual roadmap instead of just random YouTube advice. It's like having a nutrition coach who actually gets the struggles of completely transforming your eating habits.

These liver insights are game-changers for anyone skeptical about meat-based diets. Dr. Chaffee breaks down how conventional nutrition advice might actually be destroying metabolic health, and the comment section proves it's not just theory. Real people are seeing massive liver healing by ditching processed foods and going all-in on nutrient-dense animal proteins, which is exactly why we need more conversations like this.

featured_videos.editorial_title: Can Eating Only Meat Balance Your Hormones?  🧬🧬
featured_videos.commentary: Look, this video cuts straight to the heart of why carnivore isn't just another diet trend - it's about fundamental hormone reset. The creator breaks down how animal proteins and fats can dramatically shift your metabolic chemistry, potentially reversing insulin resistance and giving your body a total performance upgrade. Some folks are experiencing life-changing results: stabilized mood, better energy, and hormonal balance that traditional nutrition advice never delivered. If you're tired of feeling like your body's working against you, this might be the wake-up call you need to rethink everything you've been told about nutrition.

Live Q&A sessions like this are gold for the carnivore community. Watching Kerry and the team break down real-world nutrition questions helps everyone understand how diet actually impacts metabolic health. The collaborative approach - bringing in different perspectives and expertise - makes complex topics way more digestible and gives viewers practical insights they can actually use in their own health journeys.
